titles.title: Medicaid Birth Center Reimbursement Act
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require coverage under the Medicaid Program for freestanding birth center services.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/9/2009--Introduced. Medicaid Birth Center Reimbursement Act - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to authorize coverage under the Medicaid program for services at a non-hospital freestanding birth center where childbirth is planned to occur away from the pregnant woman's residence.
